ComicInfo.Title: Meg 9
ComicInfo.Summary:
First episode of Armitage - a long running series in the Megazine featuring Brit-Cit Detective-Judge Armitage and his rookie partner Treasure Steel.
Cover: Sean Phillips (Armitage)
Judge Dredd - Black Widow (part 3 - final part) (John Wagner - John Hicklenton) Young Death - Boyhood of a Superfiend (part 9) (John Wagner (writing as Brian Skuter) - Peter Doherty) Red Razors (part 2) (Mark Millar - Steve Yeowell) The Mega-City News (Tony Allen - design: Shanti) Al's Baby (part 6) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra) Armitage (part 1) (Dave Stone - Sean Phillips) The Straightjacket Fits (part 1) (David Bishop - Roger Langridge)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-13 22:01:15. [Issue ID 146794]
